Package boundaries

Class StaffUI

java.lang.Object
boundaries.Promptable
boundaries.StaffUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
DateTimeUI, GeneralUI, NumericUI
public class StaffUI
extends Promptable
implements NumericUI, DateTimeUI
UI for Staff users. Meant to abstract staff system from user

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static java.util.Scanner scn  
    private static StaffSystem system  
    private static java.lang.String userId  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    StaffUI​(java.util.Scanner scn, java.lang.String userId)
    Constructor NOTE: Staff system will not be instantiated and UI will not be activated until run() is called

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void addCourse()
    Method to add a new course to the system User will need to input arguments for the StudentManager.updateAccessPeriod(entities.Student, LocalDateTime[]) method for the CourseMgr.createCourse(String, String, School, int) method
    private void addIndex()
    Method to add an index to an existing course User will need to input arguments for the StudentManager.updateAccessPeriod(entities.Student, LocalDateTime[]) method for the CourseMgr.createIndex(entities.course_info.Course, String, int, java.util.List[]) method NOTE: the timetable for the index cannot be changed after being made available to students
    private void addStudent()
    Method to add a new student into the system Users will need to input arguments for the StudentManager.createStudent(String, String, String, String, String, String, LocalDateTime[]) method
    private void checkSystemStatus()
    Method to check the status of the system
    private void createLessonDetails()
    Method to create a set of lesson details using a LessonDetailMaker User will need to input arguments for the StudentManager.updateAccessPeriod(entities.Student, LocalDateTime[]) method for the LessonDetailMaker.makeLessonDetails() method
    void displayOutput​(java.lang.Object toDisplay)
    Method to display outputs to user
    java.time.LocalDateTime getDateInput()
    Method to get date input from user See DateTimeUI.getDateInput()
    java.time.LocalTime getTimeInput()
    Method to get Time input from user See DateTimeUI.getTimeInput()
    java.lang.Object getUserInput()
    Method to get input from user using Scanner object
    private void mainMenu()
    Main menu of UI.
    private void printCourseStudents()
    Method to display students registered in a course
    private void printIndexStudents​(boolean b)
    Method to display students registered in an index
    private int promptCourseSelection()
    Method to prompt user to select a course.Course selected will be recorded and used for subsequent methods in Staff system until removed
    private int promptIndexSelection()
    Method to prompt user to select an index.
    int promptIntegerInput()
    Method to get unbounded integer input from user See NumericUI.promptIntegerInput()
    int promptIntegerInput​(int lowerLim, int upperLim)
    Method to get bounded integer input from user See NumericUI.promptIntegerInput(int, int)
    private int promptStudentSelection()
    Method to prompt user to select a student.
    void run()
    Method to start up the UI
    private void shutDown()
    Method to shut down the UI, to ensure all variables stored are deleted
    private void updateAccessPeriod()
    Method to update the access period of a student Users will need to input arguments for the StudentManager.updateAccessPeriod(entities.Student, LocalDateTime[]) method
    private void updateCourse()
    Method to update details about a course Users will need to input arguments for the StudentManager.updateAccessPeriod(entities.Student, LocalDateTime[]) method for the CourseMgr.updateCourse(entities.course_info.Course, String, String, School) method NOTE: Only course code, course name, and school of course can be changed after creation
    private void updateIndex()
    Update the index's index No and the total number of slots User needs to enter arguments for the StudentManager.updateAccessPeriod(entities.Student, LocalDateTime[]) method for the CourseMgr.updateIndex(entities.course_info.Course, entities.course_info.Index, String, int) method NOTE: the timetable cannot be changed after index has been made available to students

    promptChoice

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • StaffUI

      public StaffUI​(java.util.Scanner scn, java.lang.String userId)
      Constructor NOTE: Staff system will not be instantiated and UI will not be activated until run() is called
      Parameters:
      scn - Scanner object for receiving input from user
      userId - ID of user

    • promptIntegerInput

      public int promptIntegerInput()
      Method to get unbounded integer input from user See NumericUI.promptIntegerInput()
      Specified by:
      promptIntegerInput in interface NumericUI
      Returns:
      int of value equal to user input

    • promptIntegerInput

      public int promptIntegerInput​(int lowerLim, int upperLim)
      Method to get bounded integer input from user See NumericUI.promptIntegerInput(int, int)
      Specified by:
      promptIntegerInput in interface NumericUI
      Parameters:
      lowerLim - Upper limit (inclusive) of values that can be accepted.
      upperLim - Lower limit (inclusive) of values that can be accepted.
      Returns:
      int of value equal to user input

    • getDateInput

      public java.time.LocalDateTime getDateInput()
      Method to get date input from user See DateTimeUI.getDateInput()
      Specified by:
      getDateInput in interface DateTimeUI
      Returns:
      LocalDateTime object based on user input

    • getTimeInput

      public java.time.LocalTime getTimeInput()
      Method to get Time input from user See DateTimeUI.getTimeInput()
      Specified by:
      getTimeInput in interface DateTimeUI
      Returns:
      LocalTime object based on user input

    • mainMenu

      private void mainMenu()
      Main menu of UI. All other functional methods are called from here

    • promptCourseSelection

      private int promptCourseSelection()
      Method to prompt user to select a course.Course selected will be recorded and used for subsequent methods in Staff system until removed
      Returns:
      int: 1 denoting course successfully selected, -1 denoting user's choice to exit selection

    • promptIndexSelection

      private int promptIndexSelection()
      Method to prompt user to select an index. Index selected will be recorded and used for subsequent methods in Staff system until removed
      Returns:
      int: 1 denoting index successfully selected, -1 denoting user's choice to exit selection

    • promptStudentSelection

      private int promptStudentSelection()
      Method to prompt user to select a student. student selected will be recorded and used for subsequent methods in Staff system until removed
      Returns:
      int: 1 denoting student successfully selected, -1 denoting user's choice to exit selection

    • createLessonDetails

      private void createLessonDetails()
      Method to create a set of lesson details using a LessonDetailMaker User will need to input arguments for the StudentManager.updateAccessPeriod(entities.Student, LocalDateTime[]) method for the LessonDetailMaker.makeLessonDetails() method

    • checkSystemStatus

      private void checkSystemStatus()
      Method to check the status of the system

    • updateAccessPeriod

      private void updateAccessPeriod()
      Method to update the access period of a student Users will need to input arguments for the StudentManager.updateAccessPeriod(entities.Student, LocalDateTime[]) method

    • addStudent

      private void addStudent()
      Method to add a new student into the system Users will need to input arguments for the StudentManager.createStudent(String, String, String, String, String, String, LocalDateTime[]) method

    • addCourse

      private void addCourse()
      Method to add a new course to the system User will need to input arguments for the StudentManager.updateAccessPeriod(entities.Student, LocalDateTime[]) method for the CourseMgr.createCourse(String, String, School, int) method

    • updateCourse

      private void updateCourse()
      Method to update details about a course Users will need to input arguments for the StudentManager.updateAccessPeriod(entities.Student, LocalDateTime[]) method for the CourseMgr.updateCourse(entities.course_info.Course, String, String, School) method NOTE: Only course code, course name, and school of course can be changed after creation

    • addIndex

      private void addIndex()
      Method to add an index to an existing course User will need to input arguments for the StudentManager.updateAccessPeriod(entities.Student, LocalDateTime[]) method for the CourseMgr.createIndex(entities.course_info.Course, String, int, java.util.List[]) method NOTE: the timetable for the index cannot be changed after being made available to students

    • updateIndex

      private void updateIndex()
      Update the index's index No and the total number of slots User needs to enter arguments for the StudentManager.updateAccessPeriod(entities.Student, LocalDateTime[]) method for the CourseMgr.updateIndex(entities.course_info.Course, entities.course_info.Index, String, int) method NOTE: the timetable cannot be changed after index has been made available to students

    • printCourseStudents

      private void printCourseStudents()
      Method to display students registered in a course

    • printIndexStudents

      private void printIndexStudents​(boolean b)
      Method to display students registered in an index
      Parameters:
      b - whether or not to print detailed information about each student

    • shutDown

      private void shutDown()
      Method to shut down the UI, to ensure all variables stored are deleted
